text: avar parayunnu: "nannal ninneateappam ni nirdesikkunvidham nervali svikariccal nannale nannalute nattilninn piluteriyum." ennal nirbhayamaya haram nam avarkk vasasthalamayi orukkikkeatuttittille? ellayinam palannalum sekharicc namavite keantettikkunnu. nam'mute pakkal ninnulla upajivanamanat. pakse, avarilere perum karyam manas'silakkunnilla
